name: DailyInspirationsPodcast
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Join us every Monday through Friday morning as we look at true inspirational stories from both current events and from history. We tend to focus more on "straight from the headlines" stories of average people in unusual situations, but we occasionally cover celebrities and figures from history. All of our stories are completely true, however, and we want you to start your day listening to them and feeling inspired.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
